## Functions

### canProfitablyRuntimeUnrollMultiExitLoop() {#a98b4edd31a148a751a95e80997f81c31}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool canProfitablyRuntimeUnrollMultiExitLoop (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; OtherExits, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; LatchExit, bool UseEpilogRemainder)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Returns true if we can profitably unroll the multi-exit loop L.

Currently, we return true only if UnrollRuntimeMultiExit is set to true.

### CloneLoopBlocks() {#a399d7b7e2e6aec8e1ad80d3d73b7b1c8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Loop &#42; CloneLoopBlocks (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; NewIter, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> bool UseEpilogRemainder, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> bool UnrollRemainder, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; InsertTop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; InsertBot, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; Preheader, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpupromotealloca-cpp/#ac760e37eba1d852d0a28011a1a0ce05f">std::vector</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; NewBlocks, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopblocksdfs">LoopBlocksDFS</a> &amp; LoopBlocks, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp; VMap, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42; DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42; LI, unsigned Count)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a clone of the blocks in a loop and connect them together.

A new loop will be created including all cloned blocks, and the iterator of the new loop switched to count NewIter down to 0. The cloned blocks should be inserted between InsertTop and InsertBot. InsertTop should be new preheader, InsertBot new loop exit. Returns the new cloned loop that is created.

Definition at line <a href="#l00338">338</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/loopunrollruntime-cpp">LoopUnrollRuntime.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ConnectEpilog() {#a4ebed10d3e842e81a2df6974c2fd3760}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void ConnectEpilog (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; ModVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; NewExit, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; Exit, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; PreHeader, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; EpilogPreHeader, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; NewPreHeader, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp; VMap, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42; DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42; LI, bool PreserveLCSSA, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE, unsigned Count)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Connect the unrolling epilog code to the original loop.

The unrolling epilog code contains code to execute the &#39;extra&#39; iterations if the run-time trip count modulo the unroll count is non-zero.

This function performs the following:
<ul>
<li>Update PHI nodes at the unrolling loop exit and epilog loop exit</li>
<li>Create PHI nodes at the unrolling loop exit to combine values that exit the unrolling loop code and jump around it.</li>
<li>Update PHI operands in the epilog loop by the new PHI nodes</li>
<li>Branch around the epilog loop if extra iters (ModVal) is zero.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00210">210</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/loopunrollruntime-cpp">LoopUnrollRuntime.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### ConnectProlog() {#af700561cb065af85122cd321d6c4b989}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void ConnectProlog (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; BECount, unsigned Count, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; PrologExit, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; OriginalLoopLatchExit, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; PreHeader, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; NewPreHeader, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp; VMap, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42; DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42; LI, bool PreserveLCSSA, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Connect the unrolling prolog code to the original loop.

The unrolling prolog code contains code to execute the &#39;extra&#39; iterations if the run-time trip count modulo the unroll count is non-zero.

This function performs the following:
<ul>
<li>Create PHI nodes at prolog end block to combine values that exit the prolog code and jump around the prolog.</li>
<li>Add a PHI operand to a PHI node at the loop exit block for values that exit the prolog and go around the loop.</li>
<li>Branch around the original loop if the trip count is less than the unroll factor.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00082">82</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/loopunrollruntime-cpp">LoopUnrollRuntime.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### CreateTripRemainder() {#a7bab17532f2b606ad25679ed9e138c73}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; CreateTripRemainder (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a>&lt;&gt; &amp; B, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; BECount, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; TripCount, unsigned Count)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Calculate ModVal = (BECount + 1) % Count on the abstract integer domain accounting for the possibility of unsigned overflow in the 2s complement domain.

Preconditions: 1) TripCount = BECount + 1 (allowing overflow) 2) Log2(Count) &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth(BECount)</a>

Definition at line <a href="#l00516">516</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/loopunrollruntime-cpp">LoopUnrollRuntime.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements some loop unrolling utilities for loops with run-time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// trip counts.  See LoopUnroll.cpp for unrolling loops with compile-time</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// trip counts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The functions in this file are used to generate extra code when the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// run-time trip count modulo the unroll factor is not 0  When this is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case, we need to generate code to execute these &#39;left over&#39; iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The current strategy generates an if-then-else sequence prior to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unrolled loop to execute the &#39;left over&#39; iterations before or after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unrolled loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define DEBUG&#95;TYPE &quot;loop-unroll&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48" lineLink="#a83a4a18d11086a64b8851319c00671a1"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/statistic-h/#ad6117415b93e5675d5a6c8e1855b3b2f">STATISTIC</a>(NumRuntimeUnrolled,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Number of loops unrolled with run-time trip counts&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50" lineLink="#ae9c245e2a4a3f5a845a1cbe2922af167"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#ae9c245e2a4a3f5a845a1cbe2922af167">UnrollRuntimeMultiExit</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;unroll-runtime-multi-exit&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54" lineLink="#a873b044e9706fd66860c6178f74a51f9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#a873b044e9706fd66860c6178f74a51f9">UnrollRuntimeOtherExitPredictable</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;unroll-runtime-other-exit-predictable&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Assume the non latch exit block to be predictable&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Probability that the loop trip count is so small that after the prolog</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we do not enter the unrolled loop at all.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is unlikely that the loop trip count is smaller than the unroll factor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other than that, the choice of constant is not tuned yet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62" lineLink="#a71d5cd8a9f3f2982e334cb8ce9245e96"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t <a href="#a71d5cd8a9f3f2982e334cb8ce9245e96">UnrolledLoopHeaderWeights</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;1, 127&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Probability that the loop trip count is so small that we skip the unrolled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop completely and immediately enter the epilogue loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is unlikely that the loop trip count is smaller than the unroll factor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other than that, the choice of constant is not tuned yet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67" lineLink="#ae905d898b267ca244e6d89fb1fba7c0e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t <a href="#ae905d898b267ca244e6d89fb1fba7c0e">EpilogHeaderWeights</a>&#91;&#93; = &#123;1, 127&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Connect the unrolling prolog code to the original loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The unrolling prolog code contains code to execute the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#39;extra&#39; iterations if the run-time trip count modulo the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unroll count is non-zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function performs the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Create PHI nodes at prolog end block to combine values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   that exit the prolog code and jump around the prolog.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Add a PHI operand to a PHI node at the loop exit block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   for values that exit the prolog and go around the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Branch around the original loop if the trip count is less</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   than the unroll factor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="#af700561cb065af85122cd321d6c4b989"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#af700561cb065af85122cd321d6c4b989">ConnectProlog</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;BECount, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PrologExit,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;OriginalLoopLatchExit,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PreHeader, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewPreHeader,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf0f52ae29f87b5e0f2b95ff961cdae1">ValueToValueMapTy</a> &amp;VMap, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42;LI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PreserveLCSSA,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop structure should be the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Preheader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  PrologHeader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  PrologLatch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  PrologExit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   NewPreheader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Header</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Latch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      LatchExit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Latch = L-&gt;getLoopLatch();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Latch &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Loop must have a latch&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PrologLatch = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;BasicBlock&gt;</a>(VMap&#91;Latch&#93;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a PHI node for each outgoing value from the original loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (which means it is an outgoing value from the prolog code too).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new PHI node is inserted in the prolog end basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The new PHI node value is added as an operand of a PHI node in either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the loop header or the loop exit block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>(Latch)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;PN : Succ-&gt;phis()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add a new PHI node to the prolog end block and add the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// appropriate incoming values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: This code assumes that the PrologExit (or the LatchExit block for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prolog loop) contains only one predecessor from the loop, i.e. the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PrologLatch. When supporting multiple-exiting block loops, we can have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// two or more blocks that have the LatchExit as the target in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;NewPN = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#af4aba918a76ca15bde1be3e14572e475">PHINode::Create</a>(PN.getType(), 2, PN.getName() + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.unr&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewPN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a482498a1c760122fd33c7fc8190dd277">insertBefore</a>(PrologExit-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a362b5e6097732cbc0d2fb555a1f73400">getFirstNonPHIIt</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adding a value to the new PHI node from the original loop preheader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the value that skips all the prolog code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (L-&gt;contains(&amp;PN)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Succ is loop header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewPN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#a089cccb6f231efee72abc76d0f9c695f">addIncoming</a>(PN.getIncomingValueForBlock(NewPreHeader),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           PreHeader);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Succ is LatchExit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewPN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#a089cccb6f231efee72abc76d0f9c695f">addIncoming</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/poisonvalue/#a1bf08613fb664a2e377a9a72c59a6b66">PoisonValue::get</a>(PN.getType()), PreHeader);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V = PN.getIncomingValueForBlock(Latch);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(V)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (L-&gt;contains(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">          V = VMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemap/#a15f92579a5fc316dab8cd1fad51015ef">lookup</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adding a value to the new PHI node from the last prolog block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that was created.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewPN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode/#a089cccb6f231efee72abc76d0f9c695f">addIncoming</a>(V, PrologLatch);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the existing PHI node operand with the value from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new PHI node.  How this is done depends on if the existing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PHI node is in the original loop block, or the exit block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (L-&gt;contains(&amp;PN))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Connect the unrolling epilog code to the original loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The unrolling epilog code contains code to execute the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#39;extra&#39; iterations if the run-time trip count modulo the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unroll count is non-zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function performs the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Update PHI nodes at the unrolling loop exit and epilog loop exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Create PHI nodes at the unrolling loop exit to combine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   values that exit the unrolling loop code and jump around it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Update PHI operands in the epilog loop by the new PHI nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// - Branch around the epilog loop if extra iters (ModVal) is zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210" lineLink="#a4ebed10d3e842e81a2df6974c2fd3760"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a4ebed10d3e842e81a2df6974c2fd3760">ConnectEpilog</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ModVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewExit,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Exit, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PreHeader,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop structure should be the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PreHeader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewPreHeader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Header</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Latch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewExit (PN)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EpilogPreHeader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   EpilogHeader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   EpilogLatch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Exit (EpilogPN)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update PHI nodes at NewExit and Exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;PN : NewExit-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a13da92d2694197fbcb5b95fd94e7570d">phis</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PN should be used in another PHI located in Exit block as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Exit was split by SplitBlockPredecessors into Exit and NewExit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Basically it should look like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewExit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   PN = PHI &#91;I, Latch&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Exit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   EpilogPN = PHI &#91;PN, EpilogPreHeader&#93;, &#91;X, Exit2&#93;, &#91;Y, Exit2.epil&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Exits from non-latch blocks point to the original exit block and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// epilogue edges have already been added.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is EpilogPreHeader incoming block instead of NewExit as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewExit was spilt 1 more time to get EpilogPreHeader.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PN.hasOneUse() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;The phi should have 1 use&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(EpilogPN-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>() == Exit &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;EpilogPN should be in Exit block&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a804545e5b568edec8b970da32cd37359">forgetValue</a>(&amp;PN);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464" lineLink="#a98b4edd31a148a751a95e80997f81c31"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a98b4edd31a148a751a95e80997f81c31">canProfitablyRuntimeUnrollMultiExitLoop</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Priority goes to UnrollRuntimeMultiExit if it&#39;s supplied.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The main pain point with multi-exit loop unrolling is that once unrolled,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we will not be able to merge all blocks into a straight line code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are branches within the unrolled loop that go to the OtherExits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The second point is the increase in code size, but this is true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// irrespective of multiple exits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: Both the heuristics below are coarse grained. We are essentially</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// enabling unrolling of loops that have a single side exit other than the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// normal LatchExit (i.e. exiting into a deoptimize block).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The heuristics considered are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 low number of branches in the unrolled version.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 high predictability of these extra branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We avoid unrolling loops that have more than two exiting blocks. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// limits the total number of branches in the unrolled loop to be atmost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the unroll factor (since one of the exiting blocks is the latch block).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock&#42;, 4&gt;</a> ExitingBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  L-&gt;getExitingBlocks(ExitingBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExitingBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &gt; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allow unrolling of loops with no non latch exit blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OtherExits.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The second heuristic is that L has one exit other than the latchexit and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that exit is a deoptimize block. We know that deoptimize blocks are rarely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// taken, which also implies the branch leading to the deoptimize block is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// highly predictable. When UnrollRuntimeOtherExitPredictable is specified, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assume the other exit branch is predictable even if it has no deoptimize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OtherExits.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == 1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (<a href="#a873b044e9706fd66860c6178f74a51f9">UnrollRuntimeOtherExitPredictable</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">           OtherExits&#91;0&#93;-&gt;getPostdominatingDeoptimizeCall()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: These can be fine-tuned further to consider code size or deopt states</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that are captured by the deoptimize exit block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also, we can extend this to support more cases, if we actually</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// know of kinds of multiexit loops that would benefit from unrolling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Calculate ModVal = (BECount + 1) % Count on the abstract integer domain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// accounting for the possibility of unsigned overflow in the 2s complement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// domain. Preconditions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1) TripCount = BECount + 1 (allowing overflow)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2) Log2(Count) &lt;= BitWidth(BECount)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516" lineLink="#a7bab17532f2b606ad25679ed9e138c73"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#a7bab17532f2b606ad25679ed9e138c73">CreateTripRemainder</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;BECount,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;TripCount, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that TripCount is BECount + 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the expression is zero, then either:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1 There are no iterations to be run in the prolog/epilog loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  2 The addition computing TripCount overflowed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If (2) is true, we know that TripCount really is (1 &lt;&lt; BEWidth) and so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the number of iterations that remain to be run in the original loop is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple Count == (1 &lt;&lt; Log2(Count)) because Log2(Count) &lt;= BEWidth (a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// precondition of this method).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateAnd(TripCount, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> - 1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;xtraiter&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As (BECount + 1) can potentially unsigned overflow we count</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (BECount % Count) + 1 which is overflow safe as BECount % Count &lt; Count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;CountC = ConstantInt::get(BECount-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ModValTmp = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateURem(BECount, CountC);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ModValAdd = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateAdd(ModValTmp,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 ConstantInt::get(ModValTmp-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(), 1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At that point (BECount % Count) + 1 could be equal to Count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To handle this case we need to take mod by Count one more time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateURem(ModValAdd, CountC, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;xtraiter&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Insert code in the prolog/epilog code when unrolling a loop with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// run-time trip-count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This method assumes that the loop unroll factor is total number</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of loop bodies in the loop after unrolling. (Some folks refer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to the unroll factor as the number of &#42;extra&#42; copies added).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We assume also that the loop unroll factor is a power-of-two. So, after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unrolling the loop, the number of loop bodies executed is 2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 4, 8, etc.  Note - LLVM converts the if-then-sequence to a switch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instruction in SimplifyCFG.cpp.  Then, the backend decides how code for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the switch instruction is generated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42;&#42;&#42;Prolog case&#42;&#42;&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        extraiters = tripcount % loopfactor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        if (extraiters == 0) jump Loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        else jump Prol:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Prol:  LoopBody;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        extraiters -= 1                 // Omitted if unroll factor is 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        if (extraiters != 0) jump Prol: // Omitted if unroll factor is 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        if (tripcount &lt; loopfactor) jump End:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// End:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42;&#42;&#42;Epilog case&#42;&#42;&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        extraiters = tripcount % loopfactor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        if (tripcount &lt; loopfactor) jump LoopExit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        unroll&#95;iters = tripcount - extraiters</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Loop:  LoopBody; (executes unroll&#95;iter times);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        unroll&#95;iter -= 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        if (unroll&#95;iter != 0) jump Loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// LoopExit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        if (extraiters == 0) jump EpilExit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Epil:  LoopBody; (executes extraiters times)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        extraiters -= 1                 // Omitted if unroll factor is 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        if (extraiters != 0) jump Epil: // Omitted if unroll factor is 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// EpilExit:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd628d451ca9d9b021876d59f46e670b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd628d451ca9d9b021876d59f46e670b">llvm::UnrollRuntimeLoopRemainder</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AllowExpensiveTripCount,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseEpilogRemainder, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UnrollRemainder, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ForgetAllSCEV,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &#42;LI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42;SE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/assumptioncache">AssumptionCache</a> &#42;AC,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PreserveLCSSA,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SCEVExpansionBudget, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RuntimeUnrollMultiExit,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;&#42;ResultLoop) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Trying runtime unrolling on Loop: \\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(L-&gt;dump());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(UseEpilogRemainder ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Using epilog remainder.\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Using prolog remainder.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure the loop is in canonical form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!L-&gt;isLoopSimplifyForm()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Not in simplify form!\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewExit = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9d391b6acc6d90c9b8a8442324b1aa6f">SplitBlockPredecessors</a>(LatchExit, &#123;Latch&#125;, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.unr-lcssa&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, DT, LI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, PreserveLCSSA);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NewExit gets its DebugLoc from LatchExit, which is not part of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// original Loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fix this by setting Loop&#39;s DebugLoc to NewExit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;NewExitTerminator = NewExit-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split NewExit to insert epilog remainder loop.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EpilogPreHeader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a35ee267850af7c235474a8c46c7ac5af">setName</a>(Header-&gt;getName() + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.epil.preheader&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the latch exits from multiple level of nested loops, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by assumption there must be another loop exit which branches to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outer loop and we must adjust the loop for the newly inserted blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to account for the fact that our epilogue is still in the same outer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop. Note that this leaves loopinfo temporarily out of sync with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CFG until the actual epilogue loop is inserted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ParentL = L-&gt;getParentLoop())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LI-&gt;getLoopFor(LatchExit) != ParentL) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LI-&gt;removeBlock(NewExit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ParentL-&gt;addBasicBlockToLoop(NewExit, &#42;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LI-&gt;removeBlock(EpilogPreHeader);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ParentL-&gt;addBasicBlockToLoop(EpilogPreHeader, &#42;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If prolog remainder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split the original preheader twice to insert prolog remainder loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PrologPreHeader = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#adf83581f514774264d616eef5706cf6e">SplitEdge</a>(PreHeader, Header, DT, LI);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop structure should be the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Epilog             Prolog</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PreHeader         PreHeader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42;NewPreHeader     &#42;PrologPreHeader</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...             &#42;NewPreHeader</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Latch             Header</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42;NewExit            ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42;EpilogPreHeader    Latch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LatchExit              LatchExit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate conditions for branch around loop for unrolling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in epilog case and around prolog remainder loop in prolog case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the number of extra iterations required, which is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  extra iterations = run-time trip count % loop unroll factor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PreHeaderBR = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(PreHeader-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;TripCount = Expander.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander/#ac711b5659270bd9e66b8f38ec481260c">expandCodeFor</a>(TripCountSC, TripCountSC-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev/#aefeda9454a5e8dfcec3deb106964832a">getType</a>(),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;BECount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are other exits before the latch, that may cause the latch exit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch to never be executed, and the latch exit count may be poison.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case, freeze the TripCount and base BECount on the frozen</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TripCount. We will introduce two branches using these values, and it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Branch to either remainder (extra iterations) loop or unrolling loop.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume loop is nearly always entered.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdbuilder">MDBuilder</a> MDB(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getContext());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get an ordered list of blocks in the loop to help with the ordering of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cloned blocks in the prolog/epilog code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopblocksdfs">LoopBlocksDFS</a> LoopBlocks(L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LoopBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopblocksdfs/#adc85a5f08fb0f5dc3e053975995c9d29">perform</a>(LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each extra loop iteration, create a copy of the loop&#39;s basic blocks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and generate a condition that branches to the copy depending on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of &#39;left over&#39; iterations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt; NewBlocks;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NumRuntimeUnrolled++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
